articles.author: Jason Dasey
articles.title: Turning 60 is not 'end of the road' but ageism in Australia makes life a challenge for new seniors - ABC News
articles.description: The retirement age has increased to 67, but retirement villages have become "over-50s resorts". While mixed messaging does not help, the ugly reality of unabashed ageism is a greater barrier for 60-something Australians, writes Jason Dasey.
articles.content:
You know you are 60 when you are in a lift (or supermarket) and your favourite song comes on  and getting lucky means a short wait at the doctor's office.
The jokes are well-worn and predictable but… [+10173 chars]

articles.author: James Newbold
articles.title: Sainz fuming after F1 "disaster" for Ferrari in Australian GP qualifying - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Carlos Sainz says a problem with his Ferrari Formula 1 car's starter hampered his tyre warm-up procedure in Australian Grand Prix qualifying and left him feeling "angry" in ninth.
articles.content:
While teammate Charles Leclerc claimed his second pole position of the 2022 season after beating Red Bull's Max Verstappen, Sainz will start on the fifth row after a "disaster" in Q3.

articles.title: New Covid-19 variant Deltacron has been detected in Australia - Prensa Latina
articles.description: Canberra, Apr 9 (Prensa Latina) Australian health authorities on Saturday announced the detection of a new variant of Covid-19, Deltacron, which is a hybrid of two previous strains.

articles.description: Ferrari driver Charles Leclerc takes his second pole position in three races with a blistering lap in Melbourne, setting him up for Sunday's F1 Australian Grand Prix.

articles.title: Google joins Samsung in working with iFixit on a self-repair program - The Verge
articles.description: Google has partnered with DIY repair specialists iFixit to offer spare parts for its devices. Pixel smartphone parts like batteries, displays, and cameras, will be available to purchase in the US, Canada, Australia, the UK, and Europe.
articles.content:
Spare parts going back to the Pixel 2 will be available

articles.title: Australian combat vehicles on their way to Ukraine - 9News
articles.description: The first of 20 Australian armoured vehicles will be delivered to the Ukrainian military today.
